DOC.brief_summary: Femoral nerve block using 0.25% bupivacaine or 0.5% bupivacaine provides a longer time for analgesia after Anterior Cruciate Ligament (ACL) reconstruction.
DOC.brief_title: Femoral Nerve Block for Analgesia After Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: Patients scheduled for ACL reconstruction ASA physical status III Body weight > or = 50 kg. Patients with redo ACL reconstruction Contraindication to neuraxial block allergy to local anesthetics, sulfa, NSAIDs, morphine, paracetamol Patients with communication problem
